title: Prince Miro's Escape
description: The escape plan is in its final stage. Shackled to the dungeon walls, the naked and vulnerable Prince Miro has to find a way to get to the wine cellars by nightfall. To do this, he embarks upon an ambitious plan to seduce Dio, the handsome brother of his enemy, King Jai. Miro must now use his beautiful face and considerable charms to tempt Dio into letting him escape. But in doing so, he must physically and emotionally wound the innocent Dio, who has fallen in love with him. Can he do it? This BDSM novelette (11,400 words) is Book Five of ‘The Royal Captive’ series.
author: Aphrodite Hunt
